mapper.sql: USERID,ID, SITEID, USERPWD, NICKNAME, EMAIL, MPHONE, PHONE, SEX, COUNTRY, PROVINCE, CITY, AREA, JIEDAO, SHEQU, POSTCODE, BIRTHDATE, MYIMAGE, USERTYPE, JOINCOMPANYID, JOINID, DFLAG, CREATEARTICLES, EDITARTICLES, DELETEARTICLES,LATITUDE,LONGITUDE,SCORE,PREDEPOSIT,CREATEDATE, COMPANY, ADDRESS, DEPARTMENT, EMAILACCOUNT, EMAILPASSWD, DEPARTMENTARTICLESTYPE, DEPARTMENTARTICLESIDS,ORGID,COMPANYID,DEPTID,CREATERID
mapper.select: select * from (select tt.*, ROWNUM as rowno from (select from TBL_MEMBERS t where SITEID = #{SITEID,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and t.usertype <= 5) tt where ROWNUM <= #{ENDROW,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) table_alias where table_alias.rowno >= #{BEGINROW,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
select id,userid,predeposit,score from TBL_MEMBERS where USERID = #{USERID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
